long_description: Whether you're running, mountain biking or cross-country skiing, you'll love the women's Julbo Access Interchangeable Sunglasses with 2 additional pairs of lenses. Panoramic format with wide lens surface gives you a full view of the landscape; lenses block 100% UV rays. Includes: Spectron 3+ multipurpose lenses with flash mirror coating; Zebra polychromic anti-fog lenses; and clear lenses for low light or wind protection. Curved temples stay put; suspended lenses offer ventilation to reduce fogging. Julbo Access Interchangeable Sunglasses for women feature an Asian fit for those with low-profile nose bridges and flat facial features. Protective case included.
short_description: Whether you're running, mountain biking or cross-country skiing, you'll love the women's Julbo Access Interchangeable Sunglasses with 2 additional pairs of lenses.
